meanings.definition: Relating to the production and development of living organisms through biological processes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the biogenetically modified plants in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The biogenetically engineered bacteria helped clean up the oil spill.
meanings.sent3: The biogenetically enhanced fish swam faster than the others in the tank.
meanings.sent4: Her biogenetically altered flowers bloomed brighter than any others in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The biogenetically grown crops were resistant to pests and diseases.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the genetic makeup and evolution of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The virus spread biogenetically through the population.
meanings.sent2: The species evolved biogenetically over thousands of years.
meanings.sent3: The alien creature communicated biogenetically with its kind.
meanings.sent4: The idea of progress moved biogenetically through the community.
meanings.sent5: The information was passed biogenetically from generation to generation.
